page.title: 13BUILDINGS AND ROADS
page.content: {BUILDINGS Residential land occupies most of the area containing buildings. There is very little industrial land in the area due to the large amount of arable farming. Towards the east of the area more buildings appear, as Weeley itself is just north of this part of the area. According to the inhabitants, 50% of the houses in the area were built after 1945. The west part only contains a few farms to manage the large amount of arable farmland. {ROADS} Many roads have poor services. Some minor roads are often dirt or gravel tracks. Footpaths are often similar or non-existent. There are no unnecessary roads which waste space.
